verses.name: Amos 2:12
verses.text: But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.

verses.name: Amos 2:13
verses.text: Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed that is full of sheaves.

verses.name: Amos 2:14
verses.text: Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:

verses.name: Amos 2:15
verses.text: Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and he that is swift of foot shall not deliver himself: neither shall he that rideth the horse deliver himself.

verses.name: Amos 2:16
verses.text: And he that is courageous among the mighty shall flee away naked in that day, saith the Lord.
